sourcesContent: import axios from "axios" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" export const TrainTable=(data: {id:number,sorozat:string,becenev:string,gyarto:string,maxSebesseg:number}[])=>{ function deleteTrain(id:number){ axios.delete(`http://localhost:8080/trains/train?id=${id}`).catch(function (error){ alert(error.message) console.log(error) }) } return data.map((train)=>( {train.sorozat} {train.becenev} {train.gyarto} {train.maxSebesseg} km/h )) }
